dancing-heart-pony 107399184396 "2015-01-07 10:15:43 GMT" http://dancing-heart-pony.tumblr.com/post/107399184396/the-disney-princess-10-gen-challenge-now "thesims4blogger: WELCOME TO:  THE DISNEY PRINCESS 10 GEN CHALLENGE!UPDATE 01/01/15: Hey 2015! Happy new year everyone! I updated the list with a BUNCH of YouTube videos I found! Please make sure to post a reply if you want added to the list
column2: as it does take forever to search on YouTube! Happy Simming :)This challenge I made up for The Sims 3 while deciding my next legacy. I’ve decided to re-create it for The Sims 4! Please note as well that there is only one ending this time round. Please feel free to follow previous rules and create your own characters! I’d love to see what people come up with
column3: let me know if you’re doing the challenge. :)SIMS 3: http://forums.thesims.com/en_US/discussion/760184/the-disney-princess-challenge-10-generation-legacyIt’s based off of the Disney Princess franchise and movies. Storytellers can follow the original stories or you can just roll with it. Some areas of this challenge ask for gender specific heir/heiresses
column4: this can be easily changed out if you’re playing a patriarchy or matriarchy. This challenge follows the original rules of the 10 Generation Legacy - although some rules may vary. Enjoy! Generation 1: Snow White “I’m wishing for the one I love to find me today” Founders have humble beginnings
column5: so what’s better than Snow White? To start
column6: create Snow White. Storytellers may create her as a teenager and make her evil stepmother
column7: but this is not a requirement. When Snow White becomes a young adult
column8: this story begins. - Must be female - Must have 7 children (dwarfs) - Each child must have one bad trait (e.g Gloomy)- Each child must have the same baby daddy - Each child must complete their Aspiration and/or get an A in school- Snow may never answer the door to strangers or talk to elderly women Generation 2: Cinderella “A dream is a wish your heart makes
column9: when you’re fast asleep” Although you had six brothers and sisters
column10: you always did the cooking and cleaning. Yet
column12: as it transported you away from your chaotic home life. When Cinderella becomes a teenager
column13: this story begins. - Must have ‘Neat’ and ‘Foodie’ traits - Must clean the house everyday and cook every meal - May not marry until mother dies (This does not have to be of old age
column14: but it may not be cheated) - Have a maximum of 3 children Generation 3: Tiana “The only way to get what you want in this world is through hard work” Your family has barely accomplished anything over the past two generations
column15: and you’re here to change that. This story begins when Tiana becomes a YA. - Must have ‘Ambitious’ trait - Father must die before end of YA - Must have food Aspiration- Must marry a Sim with green (This can be hair
column17: skin etc)Generation 4: Aurora “I walked with you once upon a dream” Thanks to your mother’s hard work
column18: you have everything you always wanted in life
column19: apart from love. Your father was overprotective of you
column20: and rarely let you out of the house. This story begins when Aurora becomes a YA. - Must have the ‘Lazy’ trait. - May only have 3 friends (BFFs) - Must meet future spouse at night while parents are asleep - Run away and elope- Have only 2 children - preferably twin girlsGeneration 5: Anna “We only have each other
column21: it’s just you and me” Your sister locked you away and you never knew why. As toddlers
column22: you were the best of friends but now all you have are dreams. When Anna is a child
column23: this story begins. - Lose all contact with your sister until YA - Find love with a criminal - Experience near death at the hands of your lover - Find someone new after becoming BFFs with your sister - Marry
column24: have one child Generation 6: Rapunzel “You were wrong about the world
column25: and you were wrong about me” Your mother never trusted you or the outside world. You never knew of her past
column26: and never wanted to. All you ever got was solitude
column27: but that didn’t matter. When Rapunzel is a teenager this story begins - Must have ‘Loner’ and ‘Art Lover’ traits - Must reach at least level 8 painting before YA - May only ever leave the house for school - May never have friends until wedding - Elope - you have no friends anyway Generation 7: Belle “People think I’m odd
column28: so I know how it feels to be different” You always loved books and visited the library often. You never cared for looks
column29: just beauty within. Everyone wanted you
column30: but you turned them all down. You wanted to chose your own destiny. When Belle becomes a YA
column31: this story begins. - Must have ‘Bookworm’ trait - Date at least 5 men - Meet the man of your dreams - an ugly sim - Marry
column32: have kids - Your spouse becomes beautiful (Changed in CAS) after first born child Generation 8: Mulan “Could it be
column33: that if I were truly to be myself
column34: I would break my family’s heart” Your parents always wanted you to bring fortune back to the family and marry someone of high status
column35: but you didn’t dream of love
column36: you dreamed of glory. When Mulan becomes a YA this story begins - Must have ‘Active’ trait - Must join Astronaut career - Fall in love with a co-worker once you reach the top of the career choice - Marry
column37: have kidsGeneration 9: Jasmine “A whole new world
column38: a hundred thousand things to see” You hated being rich and living like a princess. You find comfort in Raja
column39: but nowhere else. All your father wants is for you to marry rich
column40: but you want a life without riches. When Jasmine becomes a teenager this story begins. - Have a best friend (Raja)- You cannot leave the house unless it is for school - Must marry a poor street rat - Lover must be in the criminal career - Have 4 childrenGeneration 10: Merida “If you had the chance to change your fate
column41: would you?” You always wondered why your mother gave up her riches for a poor boy. Your adventures lead you into trouble
column42: and you were nearly always grounded. When Merida becomes a teenager this story begins. - Have the ‘Self Assured’ trait - Lose your siblings and mother in an unfortunate accident - Seek out a way to change the past but fail - You do not believe in love - never marry - You believe you are cursed - never have children - Grow up alone and regretful OPTIONAL GENERATIONS:Generation: Ariel “Someday I’ll be part of your world”You’ve always loved the water and dreamed of becoming a mermaid. Sadly
column43: this never came true but you did find the man of your dreams
column44: and that was good enough. When Ariel becomes a teenager this story begins.- Must have a water related trait- Must own a pool and swim in it everyday- Must marry a beautiful Sim with at least one trait the same as your own- Have kidsGeneration: Pocahontas “You think I’m an ignorant savage
column46: I guess it must be so.” You come from different worlds
column47: yet the love of your life is forbidden by your family. When Pocahontas becomes a teenager this story begins.-Fall in love with a “different” kind of sim
column48: (eg a green or blue sim)-Marry that “different” kind of sim. -Run away and elope-Have kids
column49: the whole shebang Generation: Elsa “Yes I’m alone
column50: but I’m alone and free”Your parents always questioned where your powers came from. You were a quiet type after… the accident. All you wanted was to be alone
column51: unable to harm anyone. When Elsa becomes a teenager
column52: this story begins.- Must have the ‘Loner’ trait- Must not talk to siblings until YA- Must be different in some way- Run away as a teenager (Storytellers may have her sister find her and bring her home)- Never marry and only have one child (it was an accident
column53: you swear by it)_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________People doing the challenge:PlayingWithMahKingSmartiesFancySimmer (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0xQ3wcg6Sx8&feature=youtu.be)DeapeterssonNightElle (http://nightelle.tumblr.com/)Diamonds_11_22Kayla-LouiseHirondelle09 (http://hirondelle09.wordpress.com/)ZaBZ85blackcat0526 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a5C5bfgVNRI&feature=youtu.be&list=UUG2A2rU5z8pbStoK-SxKMDQ)Simminator (https://youtu.be/jEmuD_VWd0I)NixxSims (https://youtu.be/sfFymMwayKQ)Carlimact (https://carlimact-simlings.blogspot.ca/p/once-upon-time.html)DarkRin1124 IrelandsAngel rrobeBatmansbae32Dragonish laladottyspotlaladeapetersson (http://thefreckledbitch.tumblr.com/tagged/gen-1/chrono)Peacesimmer TheLeadingLady (https://youtu.be/NjcKWE42CqM)BruNCC93 (http://secondstarlegacy.wordpress.com/)LoriVeeVoursEternalised (http://sims4stories.wordpress.com/)KrazyKatSmsWhitey28 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_TfuVD5VGHA)Strikerach123Sparkle Sparks (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=181G7_ve2M0)AccioChocobo (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NjcKWE42CqM)TheCrafter8976 (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1Q4VTFC3l8o)Crystality (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9y5Y_RPLuEg)Simminator (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jEmuD_VWd0I)EllaHolmesPlays (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gWcDmdgdtK0)Biktoria Burton (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SRse0jI6P_8)KalynSims (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wn-JllNvxzw)GoldPufflePeople completed the challenge:" False link
